about_the_game:
The Walker is a single player survival horror game. Peaceful days have passed, you no longer work to eat, but try to survive. Find out what's behind all this, hope you make it out alive.

You wake up in the city without knowing what happened and suddenly that day change your life like never before. The city has collapsed, the world is not like you knew it before. Get any supplies you found, craft what you need and use it wisely.

  • Over-the-shoulder camera perspective – Players will take a closer look at the character's position and feel the intense atmosphere.
  • Many weapon to use – More weapons are included as the story goes to suit the environment, but ammo and health kit is limited, making every bullet count.
  • Deliver the best graphics possible – Bring the best graphics to life using modern technologies like lumens and DLSS.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7600 or AMD Ryzen 7 2700 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 with 8GB VRAM／NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 with 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) / Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 ／ Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT 8GB VRAM／NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 8GB VRAM / NVIDIA RTX 2060 SUPER 8GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
